title: Dia ADC looking for Team (eng/ger)

embed.description: Blobby LFT / Diamond 4 69LP / 118W 110L Win Ratio 52% / Lucian - 21W 22L Win Ratio 49%, Vayne - 22W 15L Win Ratio 59%, Kai'Sa - 15W 13L Win Ratio 54%, Caitlyn - 11W 12L Win Ratio 48%, Xayah - 15W 5L Win Ratio 75%

body:
Hey,

my name is Blobby, I'm currently 19 years old and live in Germany. I'm a Diamond ADC main who plays LoL since February 2014. After 3 years of playing for fun I hit Diamond the first time and began to look for competitive teams. Since March 2017 I played constantly in teams with a short 1-2 month break for my highschool degree in 2018. My peak in competitive play was a Battlegrounds tournament where we played vs high Diamond/Master teams and lost the offline spot at Dream Hack 2018 to a full Master/Challenger team. With the new team I want to improve myself and my role in a team even further to eventually play in higher leagues like the ESL. The communication in the team can be english or german.

You can contact me in the client (Blobby LFT) or in Discord (Blobby #4736).
